ai-thag6.12:1.1_0: From where would anger come for one free of anger,
ai-thag6.12:1.3_0: Such a one is at peace,
ai-thag6.12:2.1_0: When you get angry at an angry person
ai-thag6.12:2.2_0: you just make things worse for yourself.
ai-thag6.12:2.4_0: you win a battle hard to win.
ai-thag6.12:3.1_0: When you know that the other is angry,
ai-thag6.12:3.3_0: when you know that the other is upset,
ai-thag6.12:3.4_0: if you’re mindful and stay calm.
ai-thag6.12:5.2_0: reflect on the simile of the saw;
ai-thag6.12:5.3_0: if craving for flavors arises in you,
ai-thag6.12:5.4_0: remember the simile of the child’s flesh.
ai-thag6.12:6.2_0: to sensual pleasures and future lives,
ai-thag6.12:6.4_0: as one would curb a greedy cow eating corn.
